com.konakart.appif

Interface PromotionIf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Promotion

    public interface PromotionIf
    The Promotion object contains information about the promotion.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Set to true if the promotion is active.
        Returns:
        Returns the active.

      • setActive

        void setActive(boolean active)
        Set to true if the promotion is active.
        Parameters:
        active - The active to set.

      • isCumulative

        boolean isCumulative()
        Set to true if the promotion is cumulative with other promotions. If it isn't cumulative but more than one promotion could apply to the order, then the promotion giving the maximum discount is used.
        Returns:
        Returns the cumulative.

      • setCumulative

        void setCumulative(boolean cumulative)
        Set to true if the promotion is cumulative with other promotions. If it isn't cumulative but more than one promotion could apply to the order, then the promotion giving the maximum discount is used.
        Parameters:
        cumulative - The cumulative to set.

      • getCategoryRule

        int getCategoryRule()
        This is the rule linking categories to the promotion. Valid values are:
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.ALL - Include all categories
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.EXCLUDE - Exclude some categories
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.INCLUDE - Include some categories
        Returns:
        Returns the categoryRule.

      • setCategoryRule

        void setCategoryRule(int categoryRule)
        This is the rule linking categories to the promotion. Valid values are:
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.ALL - Include all categories
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.EXCLUDE - Exclude some categories
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.INCLUDE - Include some categories
        Parameters:
        categoryRule - The categoryRule to set.

      • getCustomerRule

        int getCustomerRule()
        This is the rule linking customers to the promotion. Valid values are:
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.ALL - Include all customers
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.EXCLUDE - Exclude some customers
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.INCLUDE - Include some customers
        Returns:
        Returns the customerRule.

      • setCustomerRule

        void setCustomerRule(int customerRule)
        This is the rule linking customers to the promotion. Valid values are:
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.ALL - Include all customers
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.EXCLUDE - Exclude some customers
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.INCLUDE - Include some customers
        Parameters:
        customerRule - The customerRule to set.

      • getCustomerGroupRule

        int getCustomerGroupRule()
        This is the rule linking customer groups to the promotion. Valid values are:
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.ALL - Include all customer groups
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.EXCLUDE - Exclude some customer groups
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.INCLUDE - Include some customer groups
        Returns:
        Returns the customerGroupRule.

      • setCustomerGroupRule

        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.INCLUDE - Include some customer groups
        Parameters:
        customerGroupRule - The customerGroupRule to set.

      • getManufacturerRule

        int getManufacturerRule()

        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.EXCLUDE - Exclude some manufacturers
        • com.konakart.bl.PromotionMgr.INCLUDE - Include some manufacturers

      • getIncludedProducts

        ProductIf[] getIncludedProducts()
        An array of products that the promotion includes. If the array is not empty, then the promotion only applies to products in the array. The array may contain multiple variants of the same product.
        Returns:
        the includedProducts

      • setIncludedProducts

        void setIncludedProducts(ProductIf[] includedProducts)
        An array of products that the promotion includes. If the array is not empty, then the promotion only applies to products in the array. The array may contain multiple variants of the same product.
        Parameters:
        includedProducts - the includedProducts to set

      • getExcludedProducts

        ProductIf[] getExcludedProducts()
        An array of products that the promotion excludes. If the array is not empty, then the promotion applies to all products except for the ones in the array. The array may contain multiple variants of the same product.
        Returns:
        the excludedProducts

      • setExcludedProducts

        void setExcludedProducts(ProductIf[] excludedProducts)
        An array of products that the promotion excludes. If the array is not empty, then the promotion applies to all products except for the ones in the array. The array may contain multiple variants of the same product.
        Parameters:
        excludedProducts - the excludedProducts to set

      • getIncludedCategories

        CategoryIf[] getIncludedCategories()
        An array of categories that the promotion includes. If the array is not empty, then the promotion only applies to categories in the array.
        Returns:
        the includedCategories

      • setIncludedCategories

        void setIncludedCategories(CategoryIf[] includedCategories)
        An array of categories that the promotion includes. If the array is not empty, then the promotion only applies to categories in the array.
        Parameters:
        includedCategories - the includedCategories to set

      • getExcludedCategories

        CategoryIf[] getExcludedCategories()
        An array of categories that the promotion excludes. If the array is not empty, then the promotion applies to all categories except for the ones in the array.
        Returns:
        the excludedCategories

      • setExcludedCategories

        void setExcludedCategories(CategoryIf[] excludedCategories)
        An array of categories that the promotion excludes. If the array is not empty, then the promotion applies to all categories except for the ones in the array.
        Parameters:
        excludedCategories - the excludedCategories to set
